title: PM briefed on academic activities at LUMS
content:
LAHORE, Oct 30 (APP): Caretaker Prime Minister Anwaar-ul-Haq Kakar on Monday visited the Lahore University of Management Sciences (LUMS) here.
On his arrival, Deputy Chairman of LUMS Board of Governors Abdul Razzaq Dawood and other academic staff warmly welcomed the prime minister.
Prime Minister Kakar, who also held an interactive session with the students, was given a briefing about the ongoing academic activities at the university.
